content: You're welcome. The four email drip campaign is a marketing campaign that utilizes a series of four emails that are sent out to potential customers over a period of time. The emails are designed to provide detailed information about a product or service, in this case PTInsights, and its features, benefits, and how it can help users optimize their shop performance and profitability. Each email in the campaign will focus on one of the four key dashboards of PTInsights, the DRP Scorecard, Margin Breakdown, Preferred Vendors and Process Overview. The emails will drive traffic to the specific dashboard mentioned in the email. The campaign is planned to begin in mid-February and will last until mid-May. The goal of the campaign is to raise awareness about PTInsights and drive traffic to the PTInsights page on the PartsTrader website, increase usage and recurring usage of PTInsights.
